"Hey, senpai.": "Since you've come to say hi, can I take it that you have a minute to yourself?"
"From the moment you woke up you seemed to be busy, and I didn't want to get in your way, so I thought I'd wait for you here."
"...How long has it been since we were able to meet like this."
"I knew that you were only sleeping, so I wasn't worried... but I still feel relieved to be talking to you again."
"I know you think I'm overreacting, but it was a long time for those of us who had to wait."
"Y-You think so? Well, I mean- if you give it enough time, even I will grow up."
"B-beautiful? Y-you've been away for some time now, after all. Even I can grow up."
"You know, senpai, trying to embarrass me by saying something weird is a waste of time."
"I'm used to being teased. I won't be thrown off balance just by..."
"Jeez, you always act so suddenly! If you do too many strange things, I'm going to tell Matoi!"
"Haha, when we have these exchanges, it feels like you've truly come back."

"I know I'm late saying it, but...
Welcome back, senpai. I've been waiting."
"You can now call Io (EP4) as a partner."
